data.text:
+you just know about him what he wanted to show you, you don’t know h i m. 
let mac rest in peace and stop talking bad about every angle person that talked with him. y’all are being so childish and stupid

+and we should try to understand, probably, why he did what he did, or just let him rest in peace. 
he was a public figure, but that does not me you have the right to know everything about his life/private life.
you don’t know everything he was struggling with.+
